You can't please them. Ever.

What you say is just going to offend them when you are not conforming to popular opinions of the Boards. There isn't anything you can do except for ignoring a majority of Boards, taking a beating from these people, or pretending to agree with them.

It happens more and more often in Gameplay Board (especially with their opinions on balance changes) and it frustrates me to no end to see people having no knowledge of statistics or the game try to judge any balance decisions made by Riot as if they know thoroughly what's under the sleeve.

It's okay to have an opinion on the game. It's not okay to judge the game merely based on your anecdotal experiences. It's not okay to bash Riot for doing something you don't know fully of.
